column1: Smoque BBQ////- The layout of the restaurant seems problematic though.  The arrangement of the line
column4: and the layout of the tables seems poor.  You have to go all over the place and through lots of people if it's crowded.  There's no logic or flow to it.  I didn't have the problem since there was hardly anyone there when I went
column5: but I'd bet it's pretty chaotic when there's actually a bit of a crowd.  However
column6: I realize that they might be doing the best they can with the space they have to work with so
column8: you can't fault them too much.
